timeline.message: Added signature to only extract a given number of varints
Added support for converting a single LONG

timeline.bodyText:
Which exception do you intend to catch?
baos.write can throw NPE or OutOfBound but it cannot happen because it is not given Null and baos is of sufficient length.
Also you will catch the WarpScriptException which is unnecessary.
timeline.author: ftence

replies.bodyText: ByteArrayOutputStream.write throws IOException, so catching this.
replies.author: hbs

timeline.bodyText: I think the only Exception you can catch here is IllegalArgument, you should change to that.
timeline.author: ftence
ftence
